summary: Over the course of a night, a sex-obsessed young woman, a suicidal man, and a gun-crazy wannabe gangster are taken prisoner of a gang awaiting a shootout between a rival gang at dawn.
cast: Kei Satô|Keiko Sakurai|Rokkô Toura|Shunsuke Mizoguchi|Bunya Ozawa|Tetsuo Ashida|Hôsei Komatsu|Taiji Tonoyama|Masakazu Tamura|Hideo Kanze|Yoshiyuki Fukuda|Mutsuhiro Toura|T. Clay
title: Muri shinjû: Nihon no natsu
